summary: The CMV–22 Readiness Enhancement and Industrial Sustainment Act authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to incorporate nacelle improvements into the CMV–22 aircraft fleet to improve readiness, reliability, and sustain the tiltrotor industrial base. The bill outlines objectives which include enhancing mission readiness, leveraging existing technologies, and sustaining the industrial base. The Secretary of the Navy must submit a report to Congress detailing implementation progress and impact. The bill does not authorize additional funding and relies on existing appropriations.
